tools.name: navigate
tools.description: Navigate to a URL. Opens the specified web page in the browser.

tools.name: go_back
tools.description: Navigate back to the previous page in browser history.

tools.name: go_forward
tools.description: Navigate forward in browser history.

tools.name: reload
tools.description: Reload the current page.

tools.name: click
tools.description: Click on an element described in natural language. Automatically searches across all frames (main page and iframes). Uses accessibility tree and multiple strategies to find the element.

element_description.description: Natural language description of the element to click

double_click.description: Whether to double-click instead of single-click

right_click.description: Whether to right-click instead of left-click

frame.description: Optional frame selector (name, aria-label, title, or index)

timeout_per_frame_ms.description: Timeout per frame attempt in milliseconds (default: 10000)

tools.name: type_text
tools.description: Type text into an input field described in natural language. Automatically searches across all frames (main page and iframes). Optionally clears the field first.

text.description: The text to type into the field

element_description.description: Natural language description of the input field

clear_first.description: Whether to clear the field before typing (default: true)

press_enter.description: Whether to press Enter after typing (default: false)

frame.description: Optional frame selector (name, aria-label, title, or index)

timeout_per_frame_ms.description: Timeout per frame attempt in milliseconds (default: 10000)

tools.name: scroll
tools.description: Scroll the page or a specific element. Can scroll by direction, to an element, or to specific coordinates.

element_description.description: Element description to scroll into view

tools.name: hover
tools.description: Hover over an element to reveal tooltips or dropdown menus.

element_description.description: Natural language description of the element to hover over

tools.name: select_option
tools.description: Select an option from a dropdown or select element.

element_description.description: Natural language description of the select element

option.description: The option to select (by text or value)

tools.name: wait_for_load
tools.description: Wait for the page to reach a specific load state. Use after navigation or actions that trigger page changes.

state.description: The load state to wait for

timeout_ms.description: Maximum time to wait in milliseconds (default: 30000)

tools.name: wait_for_selector
tools.description: Wait for an element matching the selector to appear in the page. Useful for waiting on dynamic content.

timeout_ms.description: Maximum time to wait in milliseconds (default: 30000)

tools.name: wait_for_text
tools.description: Wait for specific text to appear on the page. Searches the entire page by default.

timeout_ms.description: Maximum time to wait in milliseconds (default: 30000)

tools.name: wait_for_url
tools.description: Wait for the page URL to match a pattern. Useful after navigation or form submissions.

pattern.description: URL pattern to match (regex or substring)

timeout_ms.description: Maximum time to wait in milliseconds (default: 30000)

tools.name: sleep
tools.description: Pause execution for a specified duration. Use sparingly - prefer wait_for_* tools when possible.

tools.name: get_accessibility_tree
tools.description: Get the accessibility tree of the current page. Returns a hierarchical structure of all accessible elements, including iframe contents recursively (up to depth 3).

max_depth.description: Maximum depth for recursive iframe traversal (default: 3)

tools.name: find_interactive_elements
tools.description: Find all interactive elements on the page (buttons, links, inputs, etc.), including iframe contents. Returns a list with their roles, names, and states.

tools.name: get_page_text
tools.description: Extract all visible text content from the page. Useful for reading page content and understanding context.

frame.description: Optional frame to get text from

tools.name: list_frames
tools.description: List all frames on the page with their attributes (name, src, aria-label, title, accessibility status). Use this to discover iframe contexts before targeting elements.

include_inaccessible.description: Whether to include cross-origin frames (default: true)

tools.name: get_frame_content
tools.description: Extract content from a specific frame (main frame or iframe). Use this to explicitly get text or HTML content from a frame by its name, aria-label, title, or index.

frame_selector.description: Frame selector (name, aria-label, title, or index)

tools.name: switch_to_frame
tools.description: Switch to a specific frame context for explicit targeting. Returns frame information including frame_selector for use with click/type_text frame parameter.

frame_selector.description: Frame selector (name, aria-label, title, or index)

tools.name: screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot of the current page or a specific element. Returns base64-encoded image data. Use this when you need visual information that the accessibility tree doesn't provide.

full_page.description: Whether to capture full scrolling page (default: false)

tools.name: save_screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot and save it to a file. Useful for debugging or creating evidence of actions taken.

file_path.description: Path where screenshot will be saved

full_page.description: Whether to capture full scrolling page (default: false)

tools.name: get_viewport_info
tools.description: Get information about the current viewport size and scroll position.
